qas.question: What cultures are listed as examples of discipline for being a heretic?
What religions believe new ideas is punishable?

plausible_answers.text: excommunication, but even to the death penalty

qas.question: What is the punishment for disagreeing with the church?
What punishment is nolonger used for heretics?

context: In certain historical <a0_0><b1_0>Christian, Islamic and Jewish<b1_0/><a0_0/> cultures, among others, espousing ideas deemed heretical has been and in some cases still is subjected not merely to punishments such as <b2_0><b3_0>excommunication<b3_0/>, but even to the death penalty<b2_0/>.
